name: Phosphor Periodics - 1
description:
A series of selected patterns of an aperiodic geometry applied using 1970s green screen display “green P1 phosphor screen” color values in design. 

Pattern generated by aperiodic tiling and quasicrystal design dating to my research from 2013 on amateur mathematician Robert Ammann's tiling discoveries of the 1970s.

Gökhan Karakuş
gokhankarakus.tez
